t: Matthew 23

“Jerusalem,*rp Jerusalem,*r who*r kills*r the*r prophets*r and*r stones*r those*r who*r are*r sent*r to*r her.*r How*r often*r I*r wanted*r to*r gather*r your*r children*r together,*r as*r a*r hen*r gathers*r her*r chicks*r under*r her*r wings,*r but*r you*r were*r not*r willing!*r
